title: Mastery  6 Tokens (Suggestion)
body:
If you get an S-/S/S+ during the game in which you level from mastery 4 to mastery 5 you receive a  mastery 6 token?

This has happened quite frequently and its semi-annoying.

Regards, 
{{champion:53}}

replies.body: why would you get a mastery 6 token from the game you only just got 5 from
You don't earn tokens in any other M4 game so why that one just because it's the last one?
Not a very smart one are you

I feel you may have missed my point. You end the game M5, but start it M4, so both are valid points to choose from.

Personally, I feel calculating tokens from the start of the game makes more sense. Given that if you lose that game you probably wouldn't hit 5, start of game is the stable stat.

Point being though, the current is start of game, what makes end of game more valid than the current?
